collection.name: Red Queen
collection.openText: When the roses bloomed in the garden, they prayed for them to be red.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was Bad, an axe flew in and beheaded employee Wushaming.
When the same work was committed 3 times in a row, an axe flew in and beheaded employee Ruho.
When an employee with a rank over 3 started work, the Work Success rate increased by a small amount.
When an employee with a rank over 4 started work, the Work Success rate increased.
